title: How is a child who is born with deafness taught? What are the various methods used for them? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do not know about the methods, but there are excellent schools meant for such children. Please go to the All India Institute of Speech and Hearing in Mysore, they will give you sufficient help. It is a government institute, and so the charges will not be much. Besides, Mysore is a smaller place (compared to major cities) and the cost of living is reasonable. Best wishes
